atraccionesAves.descripcion_corta: A zoo and bird sanctuary near Iguazu Falls, focused on the conservation of Atlantic Forest species.
atraccionesAves.tips: Bring insect repellent, comfortable shoes and sunscreen. The park offers spectacular views of the Atlantic Forest birds.
atraccionesAves.como_llegar: From Foz do Iguaçu: Bus line 115 or taxi. From airport: Private transfer. Free parking at the facilities.
